package.description:
This is an example of how to create a bridge between matlab and ROS (necessary due to incompatibilities between log4cxx/rosconsole and matlab).
Connects to SharedMemoryStorage using a SharedMemoryPublisher; connects to a ROS topic (geometry_msgs::Vector3); publishes the value of the Vector3 to SharedMemoryStorage and quits. This node is called by the test_matlab example.
package.author: Edward T. Kaszubski ( ekaszubski@gmail.com )
